Important - Please read before continuing

The Redot Web Editor has some limitations compared to the native version. Its main focus is education and experimentation; it is not recommended for production.

Refer to the Web editor documentation for usage instructions and limitations.

The following features required by the Redot Web Editor are missing:

If you are self-hosting the web editor, refer to Exporting for the Web for more information.
